sections.heading: support; withholding of earnings; service of documents
sections.text: Service of the documents required by the provisions of section 42-364.03 shall be made in the manner provided for service of a summons in a civil action, except that certified mail service may not be used.SourceLaws 1974, LB 1015, ยง 9;Laws 1983,

42-364.04.Child support; withholding of earnings; service of documents.

Service of the documents required by the provisions of section 42-364.03 shall be made in the manner provided for service of a summons in a civil action, except that certified mail service may not be used.

SourceLaws 1974, LB 1015, ยง 9;Laws 1983, LB 447, ยง 49;Laws 1984, LB 845, ยง 28.
